extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite     FREN220 or FREN221.
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from FREN215; FREN353; FREN393.

basic.description: Introduction to basic notions in French lexicology and morphology. The structure of words. Derivational and inflectional morphology. The structure of the lexicon.
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Morphologie et lexicologie du français
